website_summaries.verdict: Between its wide array of charming (sometimes silly) names, adorable mason jar, and long life, Our Own Candles are a fun option to gift.
pros: Delicious assortment of scents, mostly centered around desserts
Many scents available in all sorts of fun names
cons: More subdued scents than the loud names imply

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion - just an average candle
customer_reviews.text: The scent can be overwhelming @ times - I would not recommend for the bedroom unless you only have it burning for less than 30 minutes. It's okay for large living rooms - just make sure you only have the candle burning no more than 2 hours @ a time as recommended by Our Own Candle Company. Overall I am not that impressed with this particular candle. Caramel Pecan Scented 13 Ounce Mason Jar Candle
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE These Candles soooo much!
customer_reviews.text: I adore these candles and have bought at least 5 in different scents. All were fabulous... nice and greasy so you know they have lots of scent! Amazon packs these in thick bubble wrap (I've never received a broken one!). They are heavy weight and the long wick is protected when you open it you toss a black plastic piece holding long wick in place and trim your wick. You will NOT BE disappointed in any of these ... I'm going to start ordering them for gifts and send via Prime to friends for bdays! These would make a lovely gift! They do burn down a bit fast, but that's because there is so much scent and oil.
customer_reviews.author: M. OlsonTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Nailed the aroma.  Awesome.  Even use it in my Auto Shop!
customer_reviews.text: They nailed the aroma of Caramel Pecan. Awesome. I even use it in my Auto Shop to cover up all the petroleum smells. My buddies laughed at first, but now they all love it. They can't stop talking about how much better it smells when we are wrenching.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P., Raleigh NC.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful candles
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with these candles!!! They last long, and the scents are amazing. The prices are great. Shipping is fast!! What more do you want?! I’ve gifted them to my daughter and she loves them! I’m trying the Caramel Pecan today... I was feeling a little blue because my doggie is not doing well. So I lite my new candle and my mood shifted. Now that beats a hi priced yankee candle any day!! Keep up the great work Our Own Candle company!! Still hoping for a carrot cake scent!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Scent is Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I really like this candle company. I’ve bought several candles from them and the scents have been wonderful without exception. I wish the container was bigger, as it seems I go through them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Pister

customer_reviews.title: Great Smelling Candle!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to candle I always purchase the CARAMEL PECAN but I'm a little confused because I usually buy the 18oz and it is priced around 13-15, well the 13oz is now priced at 13 when it is usually 9.99. See I know these prices because I order these candles every other month. I don't know what the hell going on with these prices.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Just Like Grandma's Home Cooking
customer_reviews.text: These candles don't smell like scented candles; they smell like the actual thing. The blueberry made me salivate! I bought 5 and going back for more. Everyone gets a candle this year! AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Jon G.

customer_reviews.title: Great candle
customer_reviews.text: I really like these candles. They look cute and smell good, too. The scent isn’t quite as strong as anticipated, but still good and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: The candle brings such a homey scent into the house! The variety of scents is incredible. Our guests come in and immediately point out the wonderful smell of our house, thanks to these candles. These candles cover our house, with our kids, our friends, and us, enjoying the scent and the long lasting time. We purchased HoneySuckle, Lavender Chamomile, and Caramel Pecan, each one smelling better than the last.
customer_reviews.author: Leonel Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Burns well, but has too strong a scent for my taste
customer_reviews.text: I hate this candle's scent. It is overpowering to me and smells too artificial flavoring-like. I'll stick with the more botanical or sweet fruit scents. I gave it two stars for not burning quickly (which in my case was not quickly enough!) , and for not coloring the walls black. So, nice candle, wrong scent for my home.
customer_reviews.author: BusyIsBetter

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious
customer_reviews.text: I received my candle last night. I immediately lite it. The scent is delish. First burn it burnt evenly in the jar. Longevity can't say yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon summers

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, but you have to be pretty close to the candle. The scent doesn't exactly fill the room.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C

customer_reviews.title: Nice container,  little scent.
customer_reviews.text: Literally can hardly smell this unless you're standing right over it. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dancewriter

customer_reviews.title: Authentic scents and amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: My first order was missing and once I brought it up, they sent a new candle immediately. The candle smells amazing and the customer service was incredible. Thanks for everything. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Calliopy Jade

customer_reviews.title: See Yah Yankees Candles! Our Own Candle Company Offers a Better Candle at a Better Price, PERIOD!
customer_reviews.text: For the prices of these candles, goodbye Yankee candles! You walk in the house and it is lit up with the smell of caramel pecans. Smells like there is a pie in the oven. Burn time is awesome and you cannot beat the quality for what these sell for. This is our 5th candle from Our Own Candle Company and we only discovered them a week ago.
customer_reviews.author: The Pusher

customer_reviews.title: Amazon seal of approval--Carlitos as well!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like the end of summer in Pennsylvania or upstate New York. Burns well, best candles on the market. Have about seven or eight and love them all. Amazon rules. Try one, our little old dog, Carlito is so happy when he smells this scent--he twirps somewhat like a bird. Rescue pup, perhaps from a pecan farm!! The soy and other organically based ingredients are the icing on the candle.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Marie, Jacksonville, FL

customer_reviews.title: Highly scented candle
customer_reviews.text: Very strong scent so only able to burn for a couple of hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this candle for myself because my daughter-in-law had one absolutely love the fragrance smells delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Smells like other scents I really like
customer_reviews.text: I typically like candle scents that smell like sugar cookie or cupcake, this fits in with my preferred scents and it doesn't disappoint it smells heavenly.
customer_reviews.author: NesB

customer_reviews.title: Yummy scent
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells absolutely amazing. I got two of them for my mother as a gift, because she loves Mason jars. This one was my favorite. It just smells so good, everybody kept sniffing it over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: bralphx

customer_reviews.title: Smells sooooo good!!
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells delicious!! I wish it were bigger or that I had ordered several so I could get the smell throughout my house. I have purchased several other scents and so far this is the most noticeable scent I have purchased. I will be purchasing more of this scet
customer_reviews.author: lbatista56

customer_reviews.title: Good candle
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Not an overpowering smell but it fills the room and burns forever if you trim the wick.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W

customer_reviews.title: My favorite candle.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite candle to this day. Fills the air with a warm caramel, sweet pecan scent. Not too strong but not slight either. Bought twice already!! Can burn up to two hours while smelling amazing the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Catbird

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmm so delicious
customer_reviews.text: No more Yankee candle for me... This company has won me over with this scent and the smell my nuts scent.. I love burning this candle, the smells of pecans and caramel throughout the house is inviting and cozy feeling. It comes in a cool jar which makes it easy to handle and the candle has burned perfect so far. Can't wait to try more from these folks!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I gave this candle to my kids.. because ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this candle to my kids..because I Promised that I wouldn't have a lighted candle in my houe..but it smells wonderfull. ..
customer_reviews.author: froggie1

customer_reviews.title: A candle that will make you hungry!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t answer longevity yet - just lit it a few minutes ago.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves candles. Makes her happy that's a good thing
customer_reviews.author: Ron G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift.
customer_reviews.text: Decent size candle for the price. Smells good enough to eat. Excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer D. Rhynalds

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it 1 star but it actually ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 1 star but it actually has a decent burn time. Other than that it didn't give off much of a scent. Don't believe the hype
customer_reviews.author: L.Fair

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves it, she uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Hrudickadaniel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CANDLES
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery of a really GREAT Product. I've purchased many different brands of candles in the past but this company blows them all away. I have never had a candle that put out the aroma that the one's from "Our Own Candle Company" do. They are so aromatic and there is such a good selection of different scents.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: This candle is awesome. I love the scent and I love how it's a reasonable price. I will be getting my candles from them from now on. There were also lots of other scents, I will be trying as well. Definitely worth trying out!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle and it smells SO good! It really smells like I'm baking anytime I burn this candle and I enjoy that. haha. I also really like how it's packaged in a jar that I can reuse when it is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Story

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical, but after the first 30min. of lighting the candle I was in love. The scent is amazing and rich. I will definitely purchase again and choose different scents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Usually love these candles......
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several of these candles and would have given them 5 stars, but this last candle I ordered has not been burning well. The wax became uneven and the wick is not staying lit 😕 I'm very disappointed because these candle smell as good as a leading retail candle store!!
customer_reviews.author: Lbon

customer_reviews.title: i enjoy this a lot
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for the product! i enjoy this a lot
customer_reviews.author: ABAKSH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Another great scent that is perfect for fall and winter. Makes my house feel very cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Grrrrrrll

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of this candle .... however, it's not as strong as I'd hoped it would be & the burning length has not lived up to other reviews I've read. Kinda bummed as I am a candle lover!!
customer_reviews.author: Wrena

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this candle so much, it’s absolutely one of my favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Goins

customer_reviews.title: Eh :(
customer_reviews.text: In case you want to know, not a good one. To give you an idea, I love Smell My Nuts and Hazelnut. This one is kind of gross. I still will get the other candles from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Daliah

customer_reviews.title: Decent candle
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent but doesn’t fill the room. Burns clean and cute mason jar.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Turkett

customer_reviews.title: Smells great in the jar, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited to get this scent, smells great in the jar, but has no scent when burning it. If the scent filled the room I would buy a case of these. Paying $10,00 for a candle I expect the scent to fill the room, I even tried it in the bathroom with the door closed still no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Couture

customer_reviews.title: The smell is great and if the lid is off you can smell ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Mom as a gift. She loves it. The smell is great and if the lid is off you can smell it even if it's not burning.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Holland

customer_reviews.title: Love the Scent
customer_reviews.text: This smells wonderful. Plus, thankfully, you don't have the wax dripping on your furniture. I really love the smell of "Caramel Pecan". Wish it were edible.
customer_reviews.author: N Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and lasts for a looooong time
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and lasts for a looooong time! The glass itself is so pretty. It does get a bit hard to light the candle as it gets a low.
customer_reviews.author: Solveig Rørvik

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great..Just not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Love The Scent of this candle,,,just doesn't seem to last very long..good price great scent...just burns too fast
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Yoey

customer_reviews.title: Huge fan of this company, and will definitely be ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of this company, and will definitely be ordering again in the future! These candles burn forever and stay smelling lovely til the very end. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: zoe scott

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these candles!!!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are awesome awesome awesome. They smell AMAZING, and have such a long burn time. Totally worth the buy, and definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: BMichFord

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to give as a gift. I did open the lid and it smelled wonderful. I will probably buy a couple for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scent!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the high quality of this candle and the amazing long-lasting scent. I love that it comes in a cute jar as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nightcat

customer_reviews.title: Buy this NOW, you'll thank me later
customer_reviews.text: OMG. You've never smelled such a wonderful candle in your life!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cancel for the price. Smells good and lasts along time. I will keep purchasing these candles. I purchased more than 12 and love the smell of 11 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not the strongest of smells with these candles. they are just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jet Above Clouds

customer_reviews.title: Nice fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fragrance not overpowering. Makes the whole room feel homey. Love this scent. Just makes my home smell so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mvaldez8963

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles. We've had 6 different scents...all amazing! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rayanne Crane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the smell of this candle makes me feel like I'm gaining weight...it's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, gave it as a housewarming gift and they raved over it.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: ... read all the reviews before purchasing and they were great. So I felt confident ordering
customer_reviews.text: I️ read all the reviews before purchasing and they were great. So I felt confident ordering. Total disappointment. I was mad at myself for wasting money. It’s bad went you can’t even count on reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C.

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite jar candle!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles!! They smell amazing and burn well. I want 10 more!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: One of the best smelling candles ever
customer_reviews.text: One of the best smelling candles ever. Also when I cook fish. Totally eliminated the odors. I also sent to my daughter and her fiancée and they loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells good but very light and doesn't carry thought the house
customer_reviews.author: TSpa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This scent is wonderful! Would definitely order again. Candle burns evenly and scents the house nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed for the first time
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these candles for months. I purchased 5 of the same scent. Out of the 5 only 2 burned correctly. The others were just a total waste except I may try to melt in my warmer. I am not saying I won't order again. I have probably purchased 60 or so. They are usually perfect. Must have been a bad batch. They were all the same scent after all.
customer_reviews.author: Colie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love this candle! If you need a fantastic candle this is it. Will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Spangler

customer_reviews.title: great smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and it smells up the room a lot. I buy these instead of yankee candles. OCC blows yankee candle out of the water!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing smell, decent price, smell stays in the room after use.
customer_reviews.author: Kyia Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: candles did not burn well at all... they smell delicious..
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Judy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and last long. Value is great. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing scent, I could smell this before I opened ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing scent, I could smell this before I opened my package! However, I am disappointed with the banana nut bread, I can barely smell it.
customer_reviews.author: anastasia katopodis

customer_reviews.title: Caramel pecan scented candle
customer_reviews.text: Scent was not as strong as I would have liked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opulence
customer_reviews.text: Decadent scent that covers up the most pungent smells. Burn the midnight oil, then light this candle. It will provide an elegant look and even better smell
customer_reviews.author: Logan Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Best candles since Yankee
customer_reviews.text: These candles I will buy again and again, and give as gifts. They have the best scents--all the ones I love and more. All the yummy-smells-like-home scents.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Steinruck

customer_reviews.title: Fan for life
customer_reviews.text: Must buy!!!!! I loved how it smelled the same way in the jar as when burning. Will buy more fragrances soon.....
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: WOWZA
customer_reviews.text: Holy CRAP! This smells SO GOOD! I have the smell my nuts version and I love that too! I will only be buying candles from this seller from now on.
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Like every other candle out there
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't smell when burned. Like every other candle out there ! 😔
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Company.  Excellent product.  Unfortunately I don't enjoy the smell of this candle
customer_reviews.text: The candle company is exceptional with candles that burn clean and last a LONG time. However this scent just didn't mesh well with me. This company makes other more incredible smelling candles but I can't give this one the thumb's up since it just doesn't jive with me. I'm sure others would love the long lasting lingering smell but I prefer others and many from this company!
customer_reviews.author: BodeMeister

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! The scent is soooo good
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! The scent is soooo good, and the candle burns perfectly. TAKE CARE OF YOUR WICK. Trim it every time, and get all those chunks off, and this baby will burn all the way to the bottom for you, without burning a hole down the center.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite candle I have ever found
customer_reviews.text: This candle lasted longer and burnt better than any other brands I have used in the past. I was able to burn the first one that I purchased all the way to the bottom of the jar, and it was a slow burner. I love the carmel pecan smell. Perfect for fall... made the entire first floor smell inviting. Really a nice product. I purchased the first one at a local store and loved it so much that I searched it out by name... that is really saying something for a candle. Not your ordinary candle!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: These candles smell so true to their scents!!
customer_reviews.text: This scent is like stepping into a bakery or to your grandmother’s house on a Saturday morning! Smells JUST Like caramel pecan rolls and the throw is powerful for a one wick candle! They do burn kind of quickly though.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Burns down even
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells so good! It smells like candy! The directions tell you not to burn more than a few hours at a time but when I light my candles I usually leave them burning for 7-8 hours (always cutting wick) the candle burns down very nice.
customer_reviews.author: PerioGirl15

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Candles!
customer_reviews.text: Really delicious smelling candle, it's strong but not overpowering, and makes my home smell like freshly baked pie - YUM! I prefer candles that smell like baked goods, and the Caramel Pecan did not disappoint. And it lasts a really long time, which is great. I've had it for 2 weeks already and have burned it to 3-6 hours a day every day and it's on;y 1/2 way burned down. Highly recommend (even better than Yankee Candles).
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: This candle smells like fresh pecan pie and is a great warming scent
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical about the 100 hour burn time, but it lives up to it! I am a White Barn candle affectionado and this might have just converted me. The aroma can quickly fill a room, so you don't have to stand next to the candle to smell it. This candle smells like fresh pecan pie and is a great warming scent. I will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Smells AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this brand. The candles smell so good and they are so affordable! I bought 3 of them for the price it would have been for 1 candle at the big brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Holt

customer_reviews.title: New favorite candle company
customer_reviews.text: This scent is great, with heavier notes of caramel. The pecan is less noticeable. The burn time/length is great for the price, and this scent is second only to the "Smell My Nuts" one. Definitely found my new favorite candle company.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin

customer_reviews.title: I still don't smell it...but it has been buring all this time..24hrs? I rarely give reviews...I just never smelled the candle
customer_reviews.text: I rarely order a candle. It was a pretty bottle and Mother's Day...so..I bought it. I rarely leave feedback unless I like something...but I decided since I had given thought to buying this in the first place. I WOULD NEVER BUY AGAIN Still not good
customer_reviews.author: unhappy/happy

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Ha, ha, my mother-in-law came over and thought we had pecan pie in the oven. Was disappointed when I told her it was just the candle's scent. A great candle that is long lasting too.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Weeble

customer_reviews.title: Smells Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These candles are awesome. They smell great and are competitively priced. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: ... a lot of candle for the price---the fragrance is nice --not as strong when not lit as some candles ...
customer_reviews.text: First of all this is a lot of candle for the price---the fragrance is nice --not as strong when not lit as some candles but seems to burn evenly and since my husband does not like candles--this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: Nice candle with a good smell, but nothing to write home about. Would I purchase again? Probably not.
customer_reviews.author: HennahLuv

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Smelled great upon first light but the scent dulled upon each subsequent light. I normally purchase candles from Pure Integrity, which are very highly scented, so I'm not sure if I'm being too harsh but I wasn't extremely impressed. The good thing is it's a $10 candle so it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling candle
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift last year and loved it so much ordered a couple others but love this scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Ventura

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This smells AMAZING! I’ve never had a candle that is this strong and fills the house with this amazinng aroma. I purchased the cinnamon hot buns and it’s definitely not as strong as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken in perfect box
customer_reviews.text: At least other people got to light their candles before the glass broke.
customer_reviews.author: Steve More Wise

customer_reviews.title: So Yummy smelling...!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely one of the best smelling candles I've ever burned. The scent is like warm melted caramel, with a hint of toasted pecan. It is heavenly. I burn this candle in my office, and everyone thinks it smells delicious, even the guys. I will definitely purchase another one of these candles, in this scent, and other scents in this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Linnylouwo

customer_reviews.title: I love these. This is the best candle company I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. This is the best candle company I have found, never a bad product. They dont last as long as they say, but while they do, its a wonderful treat. Everyone compliments the smell long after they are blown out.
customer_reviews.author: MyGayMidlifeCrisis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome candles!
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells awesome, the house smells so homey & good!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great Candles
customer_reviews.text: Great to use to cover/remove unwanted odors. Fills the room with fragrence. Bouyght several and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel L. Abbate

customer_reviews.title: you can easily smell the candle as I sat on my couch
customer_reviews.text: Smells delish. Once it started to burn, you can easily smell the candle as I sat on my couch, and the candle sat on my coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGirlJez

customer_reviews.title: This smell is just amazing. It is happiness in a jar
customer_reviews.text: This smell is just amazing. It is happiness in a jar. Imagine shopping on a cold winters night, and somewhere in the distance you smell a pecan pie. The closer you get the warmer and more vibrant the smell. Now you start smelling hints of caramel and vanilla. It is such an inviting smell that just makes you happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: This candle is amazing! The design fits wonderful with my country theme ...
customer_reviews.text: This candle is amazing! The design fits wonderful with my country theme and the smell goes throughout my whole house. I burn it nightly and it makes our house feel so cozy. I can't wait to try other flavors!
customer_reviews.author: K8. K

product_meta.title: Our Own Candle Company Caramel Pecan Scented 13 Ounce Mason Jar Candle
feature_bullets: This candle has a rich and inviting smell that will whisk you back to days of your childhood and Thanksgiving day dinners
13 oz jar of our specially blended soy and paraffin wax
Lead free wick with patented straightener to ensure proper burning every time; Keep wick trimmed to 1/4 inch and remove wick holder before lighting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars286 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
